bug.author: mikowals
bug.summary: typo in decaying the learning rate example
bug.description:
From example in <denchmark-link:http://tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/train.md#decaying_the_learning_rate>docs</denchmark-link> :
learning_rate = tf.exponential_decay(starter_learning_rate, global_step, 100000, 0.96, staircase=True)
should match function definiton above tf.train.exponential_decay.

comments.comment: Thanks, fixed this in our internal repo -- will push out the fix some time this week.
